title: Meet the Team

content:
A remake of Sokoban using Godot Sokodot # This is v1.0.0 of our first project, a Sokoban game named “Sokodot”. It was developed & born using the Godot game engine, and multiple days of reading the Godot documentation/watching tutorials.
The gameplay is simple, move your little person using the WASD or Arrow keys, and to win the level you push the crate/box to the “spot” to proceed.
There isn’t a lot to see on the surface, but both of us gained a massive amount of knowledge on how to use this game engine and the basics of GDScript.
summary: A remake of Sokoban using Godot Sokodot # This is v1.0.0 of our first project, a Sokoban game named “Sokodot”.
title: Our First Project
